text:
Corinthia Hotel Prague launches Beer Spa Package – a detox designed to cure all ‘ale-ments’ Published on : Wednesday, July 1, 2015
Corinthia Hotel Prague launches a brand-new ‘Beer Spa Package’, inviting guests to stay at the city’s five-star Corinthia hotel and experience a therapy as old as it is unique – the beer spa – at the Beer Spa Bernard. An altogether more unorthodox relaxation method, guests are invited to indulge in unlimited consumption of unpasteurised Beer Bernard during the spa experience, and will receive complimentary beer cosmetics to bring away as souvenirs.
The health benefits of bathing in beer have been claimed since the Middle Ages and can be experienced to this day at the popular Beer Spa Bernard in Prague. Using only natural ingredients, the amber nectar is kept at a steady 37 degrees Celsius and continuously bubbling to ‘promote dissolution of ingredients’, releasing vitamins, carbohydrates and proteins.
While relaxing in a specially designed tub, guests can also enjoy unlimited consumption of unpasteurised Beer Bernard during their treatment before moving on to a heated bed for further relaxation.
Corinthia Hotel Prague’s Beer Experience package includes:
One Beer Spa Experience per person at Beer Spa Bernard, comprising a traditional beer pearl bath (30 minutes), a heated bed relaxation session (20 minutes), with unlimited Beer Bernard consumption throughout the experience
2 pieces of Saela original Beer Cosmetics (beer shampoo, shower gel or soap)
Accommodation for two in Superior King or Twin Room at the five-star Corinthia Hotel Prague or the four-star Panorama Hotel Prague, with full buffet breakfast
Complimentary Czech beer welcome drink on arrival
Complimentary access to the hotel’s spa and thermal floor
Free Wi-Fi at the hotel, VAT and taxes included
Enjoy this extraordinary spa treatment when staying in utter luxury at the five-star Corinthia Hotel Prague – package price starts from £134 (€182) per double room.
For a four-star option, the Panorama Hotel Prague will offer the same package, with rates starting from £92 (€130).
